text.more:
What is this?

This is an algorithmically generated map of Youtube

  • Each bubble is a Youtube channel.
  • Each edge represents the overlap of commenters between those two channels. All edges on this map represent an overlap of at least 350 commenters.
  • The colors are algorithmically assigned by detecting communities of densly connected channels.
  • The layout of the map was constructed using force directed layout algorithms.


Website Controls

  • Left click and drag to pan.
  • Scroll to zoom. Trackpad zoom might not work very well but the zoom in, out, and center buttons at the bottom should help out in that case.
  • Click on a channel to see channel info and filter the map to only that channel's connections.
  • The number of labels shown on screen can be adjusted using the slider available on the info panel.
  • Mobile viewing is currently not supported.
  • Click the info icon in the bottom left to bring up this help panel.


I have not done much web development like this so please be patient as I learn what works and what doesn't.

This project was made with SigmaJS and Gephi. My code is available here.
